21 #ifndef _PropertyPrivate_hxx
22 #define _PropertyPrivate_hxx
23 
24 #include "Refcounted.hxx"
25 #include "DepthSense-public.hxx"
26 #include "PInvalidOperationException.hxx"

28 namespace DepthSense
29 {
30  // the generated code can use this static class to access some
31  // private PropertyBase members
32  class PropertyPrivate
33  {
34  public:
35  template <class T>
36  static Property<T> create (void* data)
37  {
38  return Property<T>::take(data);
39  }
40 
41  static void* getData (PropertyBase property);
42 
43  template <class T>
44  static void* getData (Property<T> property)
45  {
46  return property._data;
47  }
48 
49  static void serialize (PropertyBase property, DepthSense::Utils::BinaryWriter& writer);
50  static PropertyBase deserialize (DepthSense::Utils::BinaryReader& reader, Type (*typeFactory) (int32_t typeID));
51  };
52 
53  class PropertyBaseData : public DepthSense::Utils::Refcounted
54  {
55  public:
56  Type (*declaringType) ();
57  std::string name;
58  bool isPublic;
59 
60  virtual bool isReadOnly () const = 0;
61  virtual bool isReadOnly (Interface iface) const = 0;
62 
63  protected:
64  PropertyBaseData (Type (*declaringType) (), std::string name, bool isPublic);
65  };
66 
67  template <class T>
68  class PropertyData : public PropertyBaseData
69  {
70  protected:
71  PropertyData (Type (*declaringType) (), std::string name, bool isPublic)
72  : PropertyBaseData(declaringType, name, isPublic)
73  {
74  }
75 
76  public:
77  virtual typename T::Type getValue (Interface iface) const = 0;
78  virtual void setValue (Interface iface, typename T::Type value) const = 0;
79  };
80 
81  template <class PropertyType, class InterfaceType>
82  class PropertyDataImpl : public PropertyData<PropertyType>
83  {
84  public:
85  typedef bool (InterfaceType::*IsReadOnlyMethod) ();
86  typedef typename PropertyType::Type (InterfaceType::*Getter) ();
87  typedef void (InterfaceType::*Setter) (typename PropertyType::Type value);
88 
89  PropertyDataImpl (Type (*declaringType) (),
90  std::string name,
91  IsReadOnlyMethod isReadOnlyMethod,
92  Getter getter,
93  Setter setter,
94  bool isPublic)
95  : PropertyData<PropertyType>(declaringType, name, isPublic), _isReadOnlyMethod(isReadOnlyMethod), _getter(getter), _setter(setter)
96  {
97  }
98 
99  virtual bool isReadOnly () const
100  {
101  return _setter == NULL;
102  }
103 
104  virtual bool isReadOnly (Interface iface) const
105  {
106  return _isReadOnlyMethod == NULL || (((InterfaceType) iface).*_isReadOnlyMethod)();
107  }
108 
109  virtual typename PropertyType::Type getValue (Interface iface) const
110  {
111  return (((InterfaceType) iface).*_getter)();
112  }
113 
114  virtual void setValue (Interface iface, typename PropertyType::Type value) const
115  {
116  if (_setter == NULL)
117  throw DepthSense::PInvalidOperationException::create("property is read-only");
118 
119  (((InterfaceType) iface).*_setter)(value);
120  }
121 
122  private:
123  IsReadOnlyMethod _isReadOnlyMethod;
124  Getter _getter;
125  Setter _setter;
126  };
127 
128  template <class InterfaceType>
129  class StringPropertyDataImpl : public PropertyData< Property<std::string> >
130  {
131  public:
132  typedef bool (InterfaceType::*IsReadOnlyMethod) ();
133  typedef typename std::string (InterfaceType::*Getter) ();
134  typedef void (InterfaceType::*Setter) (const char* value);
135 
136  StringPropertyDataImpl (Type (*declaringType) (),
137  std::string name,
138  IsReadOnlyMethod isReadOnlyMethod,
139  Getter getter,
140  Setter setter,
141  bool isPublic)
142  : PropertyData< Property<std::string> >(declaringType, name, isPublic), _isReadOnlyMethod(isReadOnlyMethod), _getter(getter), _setter(setter)
143  {
144  }
145 
146  virtual bool isReadOnly () const
147  {
148  return _setter == NULL;
149  }
150 
151  virtual bool isReadOnly (Interface iface) const
152  {
153  return _isReadOnlyMethod == NULL || (((InterfaceType) iface).*_isReadOnlyMethod)();
154  }
155 
156  virtual std::string getValue (Interface iface) const
157  {
158  return (((InterfaceType) iface).*_getter)();
159  }
160 
161  virtual void setValue (Interface iface, std::string value) const
162  {
163  if (_setter == NULL)
164  throw DepthSense::PInvalidOperationException::create("property is read-only");
165 
166  (((InterfaceType) iface).*_setter)(value.c_str());
167  }
168 
169  private:
170  IsReadOnlyMethod _isReadOnlyMethod;
171  Getter _getter;
172  Setter _setter;
173  };
174 }
175 
176 #endif
